alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 8:27PM CDT until May 07 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jewell County in north central Kansas... Central Smith County in north central Kansas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 827 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Smith Center, or 30 miles east of Phillipsburg, moving east at 40 mph. This warning replaces the previous warning in effect for Smith County. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bellaire around 835 PM CDT. Lebanon around 840 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Esbon, Burr Oak, Mankato and Montrose. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
